title: Help for Good Username <33 (REWARD INVOLVED)
body: So, I have a friend in mid-diamond that keeps hounding me to change my username because it sucks, and I'm started to agree. Can some people please help me come with some good usernames that aren't taken on NA? I main Vayne, but no toxic jokes pls ;p. The reward is a mystery skin or chest dependent on how I like it ;p.

replies.body:
I Win Past 20 Min
Vain Mayne
Mayne Vain

> [{quoted}](name=AznExile,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=JX2X7E4M,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-07-21T01:32:16.645+0000)
>
> I Win Past 20 Min
> Vain Mayne
> Mayne Vain

lmao all taken

Here's a few Summoner Names that incorporate you being a Vayne Main.

1. Winning in Vayne
2. Losing in Vayne
3. Purifying Umbra
4. The Uncondemned
5. Piercing Silver
6. Piercing Shadow
7. Final Hours Fate
8. Fate of Silver
9. Fatal Silver
10. Purging Element

I've also taken it upon myself to check every single one of these and they are all currently available Summoner Names.

If I saw any one of these Summoner Names on and enemy Vayne during the loading screen. I would be concerned for the well being of bot lane.

I've always wanted to recommend shawnaofthedead. Cause...y'know. Her name. But I'm not sure about the character limits. 
Van Bayne works if you're actually into that sort of thing.
